
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef int LL;

int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        LL n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        if(n==0||n==1||n==2)
            printf("1\n");
        else
            printf("%d\n",(LL)floor((log(2*acos(-1)*n)/2+n*(log(n)-1))/log(10))+1);
    }
}
